title: AI + Web3 Convention
subtitle: Brisbane, 18-19 May, 2024
description: The AI + Web3 Convention convenes global explorers in AI and decentralised Web3 tech for insights on integration and innovation. Delve into discussions on smart contracts, decentralised apps, data security, and more, shaping the future of these interlinked domains. Join us to explore the forefront of AI and Web3 technology!
